targets.query:
from(bucket: "5G")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "measurement")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Aptech"] == "5G")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "payload_data_operationalState")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "5G")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "measurement")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Aptech"] == "5G")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "payload_data_cellName")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "5G")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "measurement")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Aptech"] == "5G")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "payload_data_rmod_power")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "5G")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "measurement")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Aptech"] == "5G")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "payload_data_bbmod1_temp1")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "5G")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "payload_data_bbmod1_temp2")

  |> yield(name: "mean")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "payload_data_results_Bandwidth")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "Wifi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "measurement")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Aptech"] == "wifi")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "payload_data_details_txFailed")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "Wifi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "measurement")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Aptech"] == "wifi")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "payload_data_details_inactiveTime")

from(bucket: "Wifi")
  |> range(start: -30s,  stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "measurement")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Aptech"] == "wifi")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "payload_data_mac_address")
  |> last()
  |>group()
  |>distinct()
  |>count()

from(bucket: "Wifi")
